abstract: The inquiry focuses on Medtronic’s payment of tens of thousands of dollars to an Army surgeon while he was still on active service.
snippet: The inquiry focuses on Medtronic’s payment of tens of thousands of dollars to an Army surgeon while he was still on active service.
lead_paragraph: Walter Reed Army Medical Center has opened a new investigation into the outside financial relationships of a former Army surgeon who an Army inquiry found last year had published a falsified research study about a bone-growth product used on wounded Iraq veterans.

headline.main: New Inquiry in Surgeon’s Bone Study for Army
headline.print_headline: New Inquiry In Surgeon’s Bone Study For Army
